name: Air Scooter
description: A form of transportation invented by Aang.

name: Airbender Staff
description: A wooden stave used primarily by airbenders to augment their bending.

name: Airbender Upgraded Staff
description: Upgraded staff made by Mechanist for Aang at the Fire Nation Invasion.

name: Crystal Armor
description: Armor made of crystal that makes the person cannot move.

name: Blue Fire
description: Bend completely blue flames, which are hotter than the orange flames.

name: Lightningbending
description: Manipulate lightning by separating the yin and yang energies.

name: Bloodbending
description: Ability that allows waterbender to manipulate person's movement.

name: Full Moon
description: Enhance the ability of water bending.

name: Wolf Armor
description: Protective battle gear worn by the warriors of the Southern Water Tribe.

name: Simultaneous Bending
description: Gain the ability to unleash 4 elements at once.
